metadata.name: Dance for Peace //01
metadata.description:
Dance for Peace #Ukraine

All proceeds of this NFT sale will go to Ukraine Humanitarian Fund 

https://crisisrelief.un.org/t/ukraine

The collector will also receive additional production material upon request ( High res jpg, video files of process )

Follow us on twitter for updates on our projects. 
https://twitter.com/SugarClub_


More info about the piece:

The first Dance for Peace NFT project developed to raise funds for the humanitarian crisis in Ukraine. We use real dance capture with Rokoko mocap suit and Unreal engine 4 for world building. 

Dance for Peace project aims to support the humanitarian crisis around the globe through dance as language of peace and to fight war with art as a radical force of expression.


Concept , visual design : @sceth Sugar Club Metaverse 
Dancer : J.ko
Sound production:  Cellarkalt (soundcloud.com/cellarkalt)
